topic.title: Auto Provisioning Template
topic.shortdesc: The Auto Provisioning Template provides pre-configured phone settings, which helps you quickly provision your phones. Each phone model has a default provisioning template, you can add a provisioning template with your customized phone settings.

ol.li: Go to Auto Provisioning Template Custom Template , click Add.
Set a name, select the manufacturer and phone model for the template.
Click the corresponding feature tap to customize phone settings, such as Line Keys Settings, Features, Preference, etc.

If you want to include additional configurations, click Other, add the parameters with valid values.
The parameters you add in the template should be supported by the phone manufacturer.

Click Save.
When you are configuring auto provisioning devices, you can select the customized template.
